extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites    Level 3 or above in a PHED or KINE Plan and KNPE227.
Corequisite    KNPE254

basic.description: This course focuses on the development of sport conditioning programs from periodization concepts to specific training components and how the components can be integrated to create a comprehensive and balanced athlete training plan. Laboratory sessions will work on skill development applicable to conducting training and conditioning programs.
basic.subject: KNPE
basic.title: The Science and Methodology of Sport Training Conditioning Programs
